example.text: Each right entitles the shareholder to buy $100 face amount of 13.5% bonds due 1993 and warrants to buy 23.5 common shares at 30 cents a share.

example.text: This is because a Delaware court earlier this year said that Drexel is entitled to get its money back before or at the same time as the limited partners.

example.text: The buy-out group is also entitled to $16 million to repay a fund created by the pilots union for an employee stock ownership plan.

example.name: PP entitled-to, active
example.text: John's medical condition entitles him to a primo parking place.
